page.title: 09My New House.
page.content: When I was waiting to move I was excited.I was waiting at the window for the removal men to load the van. When we arrived ,I helped them unpack the things.I was pleased because I didn't have to share a room with my brother.My old house was a concrete house.The kitchen has a lot of cupboards.There are two toilets in the new house.The windows have metal frames and good locks.They slide up and down. When we moved to the new house the gardens were all muddy and they were split up with wire. There is a loft above the big bedroom and the small bedroom.There are wooden frames to hold up the roof.There is insulationin the loft to help keep the whole building warm.
